p: The EO yields obtained using hydrodistillation by the HD process were 0.6% for CA and 1.08% for LS. These differ from those reported by other authors who extracted the EOs by hydrodistillation from the same herbs. For LS, the range was between 2.79% and 6.28% [ 8], while for CA and LS values were 0.76% and 0.7% respectively [ 9].
